input.sentences: today i rode on a horse for the first time .
it bucked me off in the snow and left me stranded .
i walked for miles calling for [male] my horse .
i was so tired and had been walking for 4 hours .
i finally came across an area where i could get phone service and called home . i was going to be rescued !
output.sentences: An early dawn found a traveler in a baren land.
Frost still covered the grassy terrain.
A lone object stood in the area, marking the traveler's way home.
The path was long and cold.
But at last, the traveler was able to make it home to warmer lands.
